## Summary
What would you like to add or change?

## Motivation
Why is this useful? Who benefits?

## Proposal
- What should be added/changed?
- Any risks or breaking changes?

## Alternatives
Other ways to solve it?

## Scope
- [ ] README/docs updates
- [ ] Makefile changes
- [ ] New manifests / apps

## Additional Context
Links, screenshots, prior art.
